title: WSB's Weekend Bite Week Ending April 8: 'The Fed is Borderline Irresponsible'
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: The Fed wants to contain US economic growth and normalize interest rates says Charles Lieberman, Partner and CIO at Advisors Capital Management. We discuss the relative imbalance in the labor market, concerning overall trends and why the inverted yield curve does not signal a recession. 4 stock picks for right now. We also dive deep into Seeking Alpha PRO which highlights under-the-radar stock ideas for those investors looking for an edge in the market (sign up for a free trial today).
